00033 class COIN_DLL_API SoVRMLShape : public SoNode
00034 {

00037

00041

00043     OFF,
00044     ON,
00045     AUTO
00046   };
00047 
00048   SoSFNode appearance;

00052

00055 
00056   virtual SbBool affectsState(void) const;
00057 
00058   virtual void doAction(SoAction * action);
00059   virtual void callback(SoCallbackAction * action);
00060   virtual void GLRender(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00061   virtual void getBoundingBox(SoGetBoundingBoxAction * action);
00062   virtual void rayPick(SoRayPickAction * action);
00063   virtual void search(SoSearchAction * action);

00065   virtual void getPrimitiveCount(SoGetPrimitiveCountAction * action);
00066

00068 
00069   virtual void notify(SoNotList * list);
00070   virtual void copyContents(const SoFieldContainer * from, SbBool copyConn);
00071 
00072 protected:

00074

00079 }; // class SoVRMLShape
